title: Have Heirlooms You Want to Pass Down? Make Your Kids Download This App
description: Or do it yourself. These tools can help you and your loved ones catalog any belongings, along with the stories that make them special.

title: Zuckerberg Channeled 'OG Mark' to Fast-Track Effort That Became Threads
description: The launch of Threads was the culmination of a secretive, monthslong effort aimed at rewriting the narrative about Meta Platforms and Mark Zuckerberg’s leadership of Meta Platforms.

title: Wait, Are Hearing Aids Cool Now? Ask Millennials
description: As younger Americans start to experience hearing loss, a new breed of hearing aids that function more like fancy headphones and fitness trackers are coming to the rescue
